parts.text:
{"word":"returns","priority":"★★★","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vi","definition":"戻る、帰る、帰還する","english_definition":"to go or come back to a place or person.","examples":[{"sentence":"He returned home late last night.","translation":"彼は昨夜遅く帰宅した。"},{"sentence":"She returned to her hometown after many years.","translation":"彼女は長年ぶりに故郷に戻った。"},{"sentence":"When will you return?","translation":"いつ戻りますか？"}],"collocations":["return home (帰宅する)","return to (～に戻る)","return from (～から帰る)","return immediately (すぐに戻る)"],"synonyms":["go back","come back","revert","reappear"],"antonyms":["leave","depart","go away"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"返す、戻す、返却する","english_definition":"to give or send something back to someone.","examples":[{"sentence":"Please return the book to the library.","translation":"その本を図書館に返却してください。"},{"sentence":"He returned the money he had borrowed.","translation":"彼は借りていたお金を返した。"},{"sentence":"She returned the dress because it didn't fit.","translation":"彼女はドレスが合わなかったので返品した。"}],"collocations":["return something to someone (～を～に返す)","return a favor (恩返しをする)","return a call (電話をかけ直す)","return a compliment (お世辞を返す)"],"synonyms":["give back","restore","repay","refund"],"antonyms":["keep","retain","hold"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(ボールなどを)打ち返す、投げ返す","english_definition":"to hit or throw (a ball or other object) back.","examples":[{"sentence":"He returned the serve with a powerful forehand.","translation":"彼は力強いフォアハンドでサーブを打ち返した。"},{"sentence":"She returned the ball over the net.","translation":"彼女はボールをネット越しに打ち返した。"}],"collocations":["return a serve (サーブを打ち返す)","return a volley (ボレーを打ち返す)","return fire (応戦する)"],"synonyms":["hit back","throw back","send back"],"antonyms":[]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(利益・収益などを)生み出す、もたらす","english_definition":"to yield or bring in (a profit or result).","examples":[{"sentence":"The investment returned a good profit.","translation":"その投資は良い利益をもたらした。"},{"sentence":"The project returned positive results.","translation":"そのプロジェクトは良い結果をもたらした。"}],"collocations":["return a profit (利益を生み出す)","return results (結果をもたらす)","return dividends (配当を生み出す)","return benefits (利益をもたらす)"],"synonyms":["yield","produce","generate","provide"],"antonyms":[]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(公式な書類などを)提出する、申告する","english_definition":"to submit (a formal document).","examples":[{"sentence":"You must return your tax form by April 15th.","translation":"4月15日までに税務申告書を提出しなければなりません。"},{"sentence":"He returned the questionnaire to the research team.","translation":"彼はアンケート用紙を研究チームに提出した。"}],"collocations":["return a form (書類を提出する)","return a questionnaire (アンケート用紙を提出する)","return taxes (税金を申告する)"],"synonyms":["submit","file","hand in"],"antonyms":[]},{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"帰還、帰国、帰省","english_definition":"the act of going or coming back to a place or person.","examples":[{"sentence":"We celebrated his safe return from the war.","translation":"私たちは彼の無事な帰還を祝った。"},{"sentence":"Her return to the stage was a great success.","translation":"彼女の舞台復帰は大成功だった。"}],"collocations":["safe return (無事な帰還)","welcome return (歓迎される帰還)","triumphant return (凱旋帰国)","long-awaited return (待望の帰還)"],"synonyms":["homecoming","reappearance","restitution"],"antonyms":["departure","absence"]},{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"返却、返品","english_definition":"the act of giving or sending something back.","examples":[{"sentence":"The store has a 30-day return policy.","translation":"その店には30日間の返品ポリシーがある。"},{"sentence":"He requested a return of the defective product.","translation":"彼は欠陥品の返品を要求した。"}],"collocations":["product return (製品の返品)","tax return (税金の還付)","return policy (返品ポリシー)","return address (返送先住所)"],"synonyms":["refund","restitution","repayment"],"antonyms":["purchase","acquisition"]},{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"利益、収益、収益率","english_definition":"the profit or yield from an investment.","examples":[{"sentence":"The return on investment was very high.","translation":"投資収益率は非常に高かった。"},{"sentence":"They are looking for a good return on their money.","translation":"彼らは資金の良い収益率を求めている。"}],"collocations":["return on investment (投資収益率)","high return (高い収益)","low return (低い収益)","financial return (財務収益)"],"synonyms":["profit","yield","revenue","gain"],"antonyms":["loss","expense"]},{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"(ボールなどを)打ち返すこと、投げ返すこと","english_definition":"the act of hitting or throwing back a ball or other object.","examples":[{"sentence":"His return was too powerful for his opponent to handle.","translation":"彼の打ち返しは相手が対処するには強すぎた。"},{"sentence":"She made a great return of serve.","translation":"彼女は素晴らしいサーブの打ち返しをした。"}],"collocations":["return of serve (サーブの打ち返し)","strong return (強い打ち返し)","weak return (弱い打ち返し)"],"synonyms":["rebound","rejoinder"],"antonyms":[]},{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"(公式な書類などの)提出、申告","english_definition":"the submission of a formal document.","examples":[{"sentence":"The deadline for tax returns is approaching.","translation":"税務申告の締め切りが近づいている。"},{"sentence":"He filed his tax return early this year.","translation":"彼は今年、早めに税務申告をした。"}],"collocations":["tax return (税務申告)","income tax return (所得税申告)","annual return (年次報告書)"],"synonyms":["submission","filing","declaration"],"antonyms":[]}],"etymology":{"value":"古フランス語の「retorner」（回る、戻る）から派生。ラテン語の「re-」（再び）+「tornare」（回す、旋盤にかける）に由来。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/rɪˈtɜːrnz/","syllables":"re-turns"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_simple":["return","returns"],"past_simple":"returned","past_participle":"returned","present_participle":"returning"},"noun_plural":"returns"},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「**returns**」は「return」の複数形であり、動詞としては三人称単数現在形です。名詞としては、複数の帰還、返却、利益、申告などを指します。文脈によって意味が大きく異なるため、注意が必要です。特に金融や税務の文脈では専門的な意味を持つことがあります。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ He returns back to his country.","correct":"✓ He returns to his country.","note":"「return」自体に「戻る」という意味が含まれているため、「back」を重ねて使うのは冗長です。"},{"incorrect":"✗ She returned the book to me for free.","correct":"✓ She returned the book to me.","note":"「return」は基本的に何かを返す行為を指すため、「for free（無料で）」という表現は不要です。もし無料であることを強調したい場合は、「She gave the book back to me.」のように表現できます。"},{"incorrect":"✗ The investment returns a lot of money back.","correct":"✓ The investment returns a lot of money.","note":"動詞の「return」に「back」をつけるのは冗長です。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["returnable (形容詞: 返品可能な)","returning (形容詞: 帰還中の、戻りつつある)"],"phrasal_verbs":["return to (～に戻る)","return fire (応戦する)"],"idioms_phrases":["many happy returns (お誕生日おめでとう)"],"priority":"★★★"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B1","frequency_google_ngram":"高頻度 (High frequency)","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B1","text":"「**returns**」は「return」の複数形または三人称単数現在形です。「return」は、場所や人へ「戻る」こと、何かを「返す」こと、投資から「利益を得る」こと、税金申告書などの書類を「提出する」ことなど、様々な意味を持つ単語です。名詞としては、帰還、返却、利益、提出などを指します。文脈によって意味が異なるため、注意して読む必要があります。例えば、「tax returns」は「税金申告」のことです。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"The soldiers made a triumphant **return** after the war.","translation":"兵士たちは戦後、凱旋帰国を果たした。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"帰還"},{"sentence":"The store accepts **returns** within 30 days.","translation":"その店では30日以内の返品を受け付けている。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"返却"},{"sentence":"The investment **returns** a high profit.","translation":"その投資は高い利益を生み出す。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"利益を生み出す"},{"sentence":"She **returns** to her hometown every summer.","translation":"彼女は毎年夏に故郷に帰る。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"戻る"},{"sentence":"He **returns** the serve with a powerful shot.","translation":"彼は力強いショットでサーブを打ち返す。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"打ち返す"},{"sentence":"You must file your tax **returns** by April 15th.","translation":"4月15日までに税務申告書を提出しなければならない。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"提出"}]}
}
